Comment: While I will say that Newsom has been rubbing me the wrong way lately...  I will say what I want in the party platform.  * Fight against Citizens United - Corps are not people * Treat all people with fairness and respect. * Support Ukraine and free people everywhere. * Sensible Gun laws * Healthcare as a basic human right * Reign in, out of control, business and billionaire loopholes * Remove most money in elections (possible taxes pay for equal campaign runs.) Bring it back to the policies. * Remove elected officials ability to participate in stock trading.  That would be my starters. Though I probably missed some, if so i'll try to add later.

Comment: It's delusional and disingenuous.  The party is absolutely convinced it is serving voters' interests, when it is really only preserving itself (and doing a bad job of that). Democrats need to rediscover what they were before Clinton.
